name: The Star Treatment - Personal Photographer
description: I'm a professional advertising and editorial photographer who's motivation is to provide  fellow travelers with a unique experience in LA, and most of all, some killer photos to fill their scrapbooks with!   During our session, we'll pick activities and locations that best suite you - roam down a street full of boutiques shopping with friends, grab a coffee at a quaint cafe, check out the industrial scene downtown, catch a romantic sunset at Griffith Observatory, or hike to the Hollywood sign. I'll capture the natural moments of your travel experience so you can see LA with open eyes, instead of through an LCD screen!  You can choose your activity and location (within 10 miles of zipcode 90027), or I can suggest one, based on your interests. Think of me like your own personal paparazzi in the city of Stars!
